projects.name: Checkmark
projects.intro: Decision quality assurance system for the Planning Inspectorate
projects.brief: The aim was to unify all quality assurance functions across the Planning Inspectorate, increasing the scope of data captured, reducing admin overhead and the likelihood of data errors, whilst providing users with a self-service system
projects.execution: Three apps were built using Microsoft Power Apps, supported by 6 SharePoint lists/libraries and 19 Power Automate flows. The final solution had saved over 500 weeks from overall case age as of the end of the pilot phase alone.

projects.name: Beers collection
projects.brief: Create a collection app using PHP and MySQL, enabling the display of all database items as well as the addition of new ones.

projects.name: Thump a Trump
projects.execution: First team project, Over delivered on requirements.

projects.name: Finance calculator
projects.intro: Loan finance calculator for Mayden Academy
projects.brief:
Create a finance calculator to be used on the Mayden Academy website, enabling prospective students to calculate the time take to repay their loan, as well as any applicable admin fees.
Must be built using TypeScript and a CSS preprocessor
